channel.title: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing
channel.description:
[u][b]NO I'M NOT GONNA MAKE YOU BETA TESTER[/b][/u]
Like what the title says. How do I do it?

item.title: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

[quote=“LahainaGeneration, post:3, topic:383999”][quote author=ryanyukon199 link=topic=479755.msg3512635#msg3512635 date=1298701400]
To make The server downloadable
You want a file called (Winrar) Just search it in the address,
Once you have “Winrar” INSTALLED, you want to right click the folder you are trying to upload and click
add to archive…
Once you have done that there will be another file called (What ever you file name was called)
and it will be a stack of books…
Now! go to an uploading site like megaupload etc… and upload the winrar file
HAVE FUN!
[/quote]

Explain better please, because I did what you just said and it made my folder in a rar file with everything in the regular folder[/quote]
No shit? I think your WinRAR is bugged.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing

add to archive…
Once you have done that there will be another file called (What ever you file name was called)

Now! go to an uploading site like megaupload etc… and upload the winrar file
HAVE FUN!

Explain better please, because I did what you just said and it made my folder in a rar file with everything in the regular folder[/quote]

lollollollollollollollollmfaolmfaolmfaolmfaolmfaolmfaolmfaolollollollollollollollolroflroflroflrofl

thats what is supposed to happen when you compress it with winrar?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing

item.title: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

first you run the server.

then you zip the client(after configuring it to connect to your server.

right click the folder the client is in and click send to…and choose compressed zip folder.
(if you dont see this option then you need to install this: http://tinyurl.com/kpnwfw

now upload the zipped version of the client to any of these sites(there all free)

http://rapidshare.com/
or
http://uppit.com/
or
http://www.mediafire.com/

then go to your server status page and just post the link to the client, and people will be able to download it, extract it(to get to the folders) and click run which will allow them to play your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my 317 server downloadable for beta testing
